title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.244 - Patient care services revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.244 - Patient care services revenue

State Regulations

The hospital's full established charges for services
rendered to patients regardless of amounts actually paid to the hospital by or
in behalf of patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.244

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
